description.value: Character ignores penalties to their Movement Rate due to thick or difficult terrain, although not neccisarily for dangerous environments such as burning buildings. Additionally, once per Session they may reroll one Failed Test for the Tracking Special Use of the Survival Skill.

system.benefit: Character ignores penalties to their Movement Rate due to thick or difficult terrain, although not neccisarily for dangerous environments such as burning buildings. Additionally, once per Session they may reroll one Failed Test for the Tracking Special Use of the Survival Skill.

skills.condition: When navigating on foot in wilderness

specialAbilities.name: Move Through Difficult Terrain
specialAbilities.description: You can move through difficult terrain without penalty.
